name: Enterprise Adaptive Driving Equipment
description: Free adaptive driving equipment with car rental for customers with disabilities
fullDescription: Enterprise Rent-A-Car provides adaptive driving equipment at no additional charge to customers with disabilities, including hand controls, spinner knobs, left foot accelerators, and pedal extenders.
whatTheyOffer:
- Hand controls at no extra charge
- Left foot accelerators
- Spinner knobs
- Pedal extenders
- No additional rental fee for equipment
- Available at most US locations
howToGetIt:
1. Call Enterprise reservation line: 1-866-225-4284
2. Request adaptive equipment when booking
3. Specify type of equipment needed
4. Allow 24-72 hours advance notice
5. Equipment installed before pickup
6. No additional documentation required
keywords: Enterprise, car rental, adaptive equipment, hand controls, disability, accessible vehicle, mobility
